org.digijava.kernel.xmlpatches

Class SqlExec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.xmlpatches.SqlExec

  • public final class SqlExec
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void exec(java.lang.String sql)
      A helper method to execute any sql without having to switch from bsh to sql executor.
      static void tableMap(java.lang.String tableNameExpression, java.lang.String sqlTemplate)
      Execute an arbitrary sql for each matched table.
      static void viewMap(java.lang.String viewNameExpression, java.lang.String sqlTemplate)
      Execute an arbitrary sql for each matched view.

    • Method Detail

      • exec

        public static void exec(java.lang.String sql)
        A helper method to execute any sql without having to switch from bsh to sql executor.
        Parameters:
        sql - sql to execute

      • tableMap

        public static void tableMap(java.lang.String tableNameExpression,
                            java.lang.String sqlTemplate)
        Execute an arbitrary sql for each matched table.
        Parameters:
        tableNameExpression - to be passed to pg's like operator
        sqlTemplate - to be formatted via MessageFormat with table name as parameter

      • viewMap

        public static void viewMap(java.lang.String viewNameExpression,
                           java.lang.String sqlTemplate)
        Execute an arbitrary sql for each matched view.
        Parameters:
        viewNameExpression - to be passed to pg's like operator
        sqlTemplate - to be formatted via MessageFormat with view name as parameter
